patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I have loose stools every time I eat. Why can't I hold food?'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The Spleen is too weak to Transform & Transport. We must 'Tonify Earth' to dry the dampness. Do not purge.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I wake up at 5 AM with urgent diarrhea (Cock's Crow). Why?'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: This is 'Gate of Vitality' failure. The Yang fire is too weak to cook the food overnight. We must use Moxa to warm the core.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'My stomach hurts and runs loose only when I'm stressed.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Wood is attacking Earth. Treating the gut alone will fail; we must calm the Liver (Stress) first to stop the attack.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel bloated and stuck, like pebble stools. Laxatives barely help.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The gut isn't blocked by solids, but by 'Air/Qi' tension. We must Move Qi, not just purge stool. Relax the intestine.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'My stool is dry and hard to pass. I feel tired and dizzy.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: 'No water in the boat.' The intestine lacks fluid. Bulk laxatives make this worse. We must Moisten and Nourish blood.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I have no urge to go, and my stomach feels cold to the touch.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The bowel lacks the 'heat' to move (peristalsis). We must warm the Yang to create movement force.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I switch between diarrhea and constipation constantly.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: This is a complex Shao Yang/Jue Yin pattern. We need a formula that can separate clear/turbid and handle heat/cold simultaneously.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I bloat like a balloon immediately after sugar/carbs.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Rapid fermentation indicates Damp-Heat. We must aggressively drain dampness and clear the 'fermenting' heat.
pharmacopeia: Xiang Sha Liu Jun Zi Tang

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I am severely constipated and burp constantly.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Methane slows transit. We need strong 'descending' action (Yang Ming Fu). Prokinetics are essential here.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel flu-like and toxic since starting the herbs.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: This is a Herxheimer reaction. The bacteria are releasing endotoxins. We must clear Toxicity and Vent heat.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I react to almost every food now. My system feels broken.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The 'holding' function of the Spleen is gone, allowing leakage. We must lift Qi and stabilize the barrier.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I get palpitations and anxiety that go straight to my stomach.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The Shen (Mind) and Yi (Digestion) are disconnected. We must nourish Heart Blood to calm the digestive nervous system.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel a lump in my throat and chest tightness, but doctors see nothing.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: This is 'Qi Stagnation' manifesting in the throat (esophagus). It is emotional stagnation. Resolve Phlegm-Qi.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel like a brick is in my stomach, and my breath smells bad.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The mechanism is jammed. We must mechanically 'dissolve' the accumulation with digestive herbs (Hawthorn/Radish seed).

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'There is mucous/pus in my stool and it burns.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: This indicates active inflammation/infection (Damp-Heat). We must clear heat and stop dysentery.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'My gut cramps move around; it feels like spasms.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The nerves are hypersensitive (Wind). We must extinguish internal wind to stop the cramping spasms.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'My gut hasn't been right since that food poisoning last year.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: A 'Latent Pathogen' is hiding in the deeper levels. We must vent the lingering heat out to the surface.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel full even after eating a tiny amount.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The Qi mechanism of the Middle Jiao is stuck. We simply need to re-start the flow of traffic.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'My stomach grumbles and makes loud noises constantly.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Water and Gas are mixing due to weak transport. Strengthen Spleen to quiet the 'sloshing' sound.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I feel a heavy dragging sensation downward after bowel movements.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Spleen Qi is too weak to hold organs in place. We must use strong moxa and lifting herbs.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I cannot control my bowels sometimes.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The 'Gate' is not closing. We must astringe and warm the lower orifices strongly.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I have brain fog, craving sugar, and a white coated tongue.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Fungus thrives in Dampness. We must 'Drain the Swamp' (Dampness) so the fungus has nowhere to live.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'Food sits in my stomach for hours without moving.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The Stomach Qi lacks the power to descend. We must tonify Stomach Qi and direct it downward.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I pass gas constantly, sometimes painful.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: Gas is 'Wind' generated by fermentation (Damp) or Stagnation. Regulate the Liver and Drain Damp.

patient_qa_concern: Patient: 'I get the runs immediately before a meeting or event.'
therapist_strategy_deep_thinking: Strategy: The 'Fight or Flight' (Wood) is purging the gut (Earth). We must stabilize the Spirit to hold the gut.
